title: WATCH: St Kevin's Boys U13s score team wonder goal
description: Dublin club St Kevin's Boys scored a beautifully well-worked team goal that even Pep Guardiola would be proud of.
content:
The U13 team, competing in the semi-final of a regional cup competition, took the ball from kick-off and played their way out from the back, even trusting in their goalkeeper to join in.
Their opponents Belvedere FC, who were beaten 6-1, were unable to get a single touch on the ball as St Kevin's Boys calmly passed around them.
Having drawn the defenders up-field, St Kevin's broke with speed down the right wing and a pin-point cross picked out an attacker arriving at the back post to head home.
The club has a reputation as one of Europe's elite schoolboy sides, producing the likes of Damien Duff, Robbie Brady and Jeff Hendrick.
St Kevin's even got the better of Barcelona's youth team in 2016, earning a famous 1-0 victory in the Academy Cup.
Watch the wonder goal by clicking on the video above.
